name: Sanppo.GitHub.io
body:
### Welcome to Sanppo.kr

## Who we are.
A Software and Service Company for Users' Convenience.

## What does the name [Sanppo] mean?
The word [Sanppo] is a pronunciation of korean word [산보] and japanese word [散歩].
Same pronunciation, Same meaning.

In english, it means [Stroll] or [Walk]

We wish to work like [Sappo] with contemplation.
We wish to make useful, comfortable and joyful things like [Sappo]


### Authors and Contributors
@dullfrog of Sanppo Inc.

### Support or Contact
Need help?
Please contact with js.jee@sanppo.kr
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
